process.name: reader-approval
process.label: Faculty reader has approved (signal from PeopleSoft)

process.name: submit-marc
process.label: Transfer stub MARC record to Symphony (drop off directory)

process.name: check-marc
process.label: Daily check to see if MARC record has been created in Symphony

process.name: catalog-status
process.label: Monitor Symphony status until Cataloging is done

process.name: other-metadata
process.label: Generate content, technical and rights metadata

process.name: binder-transfer
process.label: Transfer PDF to binder drop off directory for bound physical copy
